item.title: Why Trust Leads and Speed Follows in Agentic Design
item.description: In the world of development, there’s a crucial trade-off: speed versus trust. With AI agents becoming more integrated into workflows, the focus shifts from how fast they act to how trustworthy they are. AI agents can enhance productivity when trust is prioritized alongside speed. They transform goals into actions, adapting to context and collaborating effectively in multi-agent systems. However, while agents show promise in routine tasks, their contributions require supervision to avoid…

item.title: JetBrains AI Assistant Update: Better Context, Greater Offline Flexibility, Deeper IDE Integration
item.description: ğŸš€ JetBrains AI Assistant has received a significant update! Key features include smarter code completion with support for more languages and file types like SQL and Markdown.
